# Preliminary {.unnumbered}

Example case: You are the clinical coordinator for a clinical trial. You are enrolling patients at X locations and want to add a new site. In order to add a new site, an institution review board (IRB) must review and approve your trial protocol.

What would be my "Stopping rule"?

Stopping protocol

:   the set of rules that either helps me declare trail a success or a failure (to minimise losses)
